HOME.jmt-info_h2: Connect with developer friends on DICE
HOME.jmt-info_h3: Get in-the-moment updates on the things that interest you on IT. And help your developer friends, in real time
HOME.registrationSuccess: Success! Your account has been registered.
HOME.imageChangeMessage: Your photo has changed. Please, close the window.
HOME.emailAlert: You must enter an email address
HOME.emailInvalidAlert: Your email address is invalid. Please enter a valid address
HOME.diceDescription: DICE is a free social networking website that allows registered users to create profiles, send messages and keep in touch with developer friends or colleagues
HOME.diceSuchAs: The site includes public features such as:
HOME.makePostsDesc: - allows members to post, read and respond to classified ads.
HOME.sendMessDesc: - allows members use Direct Messages to have private conversations with people about IT and other content.
HOME.forumDevDesc: - a great place to post questions and share comments with fellow developers or discuss a variety of development topics IT.

EDIT.editMessage: Your data has been changed correctly =)
EDIT.editEmailMessage: Your email has been changed correctly.
EDIT.editPassMessage: Your password has been changed correctly.
EDIT.passwordInfo: You can use any combination of Latin letters, numbers and special symbols ! @ # $ % ^ & * ( ) _ - +. Your password should not be shorter than 6 characters.
